responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[4BE4F0A16D08556ACD6685BF392E6719]", "1D7F0D42433FF4242FA9F895CEBD2C5E", "What if the animating force within them isn\'t just magic, but... a spirit? Or something akin to it, bound to the clay and metal. The ancient texts are very clear: binding a sentient spirit into an artificial form is forbitten: a profanity against the natural order. Yet, the elegance and power of these binding runes...It\'s a chilling thought.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_RunescribeFlinthelm_8_Response
